description:
Individuals are assigned to a firm size according to the largest number of workers based on either their primary employer, their spouse’s primary employer or (in the case of children) each parent’s primary employer.  Individuals with no workers in their immediate family (health insurance unit) are excluded from this analysis.

The uninsured includes individuals with no coverage other than access to the Indian Health Service.

name: Measure 13  Percentage Of The Nonelderly Population With Health Insurance Coverage | Employer Size
